references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, demonstrating their superiority to GANs in image generation and establishing their widespread adoption.
This paper introduced the core concept of denoising diffusion models, laying the theoretical groundwork for many subsequent advancements in the field.

references.paper_title: An image is worth 16x16 words: Transformers for image recognition at scale
references.reason: This work introduced the Transformer architecture to computer vision, significantly impacting the design of diffusion transformers and other visual models.
This paper specifically adapted the Transformer architecture to diffusion models, addressing the scalability challenges and establishing diffusion transformers as a prominent model type.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper provided a comprehensive theoretical framework for score-based generative modeling using stochastic differential equations, enhancing the understanding and development of diffusion models.
